Key Features:
  • Fully automated stackable PureLight™ units.
  • Self-regulating water, lighting, feeding, climate and ventilation/air filtration.
  • Plug-and-play setup.
  • Neural AI handling seeding, watering, pest control, and harvesting cues.
  • Community Hub - share recipes and trade produce with neighbours.
  • Time Needed < 5 min / week.
Service Model:
  • Our expert team delivers and installs the full system at your home for zero-effort setup.
  • Fortnightly drone swap-outs of pre-seeded, pre-cycled modules (e.g., hydroponic herb pods or aquaponic shrimp tanks). We handle swaps, cleaning, and reseeding - you get alerts for zero-effort maintenance.
